actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a foster care provider and a qualified foster individual may share the same home.
short_title: Foster Care Living Arrangements Act of 1994

summary.text: Foster Care Living Arrangements Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that for purposes of excluding foster care payments from gross income, if a provider of foster care is living in the home of the individual receiving the foster care, that home shall be treated as the home of the foster care provider.

titles.title: Foster Care Living Arrangements Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a foster care provider and a qualified foster individual may share the same home.
